title: New-ish player with a ban here...
body:
Anyone else get banned for using "3rd party software" without having ever done any such thing?

I played for a few weeks and then got banned... does this happen a lot?

replies.body: Hey there, we'd like to look into your specific case!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our PB team can help out with this.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

The 2nd ticket was closed, too.

Since I didn't use any software in conjunction with playing (other than Discord, but I don't see what it has to do with anything ), I'd say the software used for detecting cheating is flawed.  I just can't see any other explanation.  I live alone... nobody's going to break into my house and only mess with my League of Legends client.

It's almost funny that the person who closed the second ticket commented that "the suspension was justified".  There's this subtext of certainty laced in the support responses that makes me wonder what sort of "investigation" they do; I'm guessing none.  I do wonder what I've done that's so different from any other random new player.  Given how little I played, I wouldn't be surprised that this happens frequently and most people probably just don't bother fighting it.
